actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to change the title of hearing examiners to administrative law judge, to provide that the salary of each such official shall be 90 percent of the salary of U.S. district court judges.

summary.text: Changes the title of Federal hearing examiners to administrative law judges. Sets the salary for such officials at 90 percent of the salary paid United States district court judges.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to change the title of hearing examiners to administrative law judge, to provide that the salary of each such official shall be 90 percent of the salary of U.S. district court judges.
